7170.quoteText:
Do-Not-Track Requests

Currently, our systems do not recognize browser “do-not-track” requests.
7170.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

tosdr.case: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

7171.quoteText: Custom Audiences and Matching . Unless you have opted out, we may share certain information (such as your email address) with third parties – such as Facebook and Google – so that we can better target ads and content to our Users, and others with similar interests, within their services.
7171.title: The service allows you to opt out of providing personal information to third parties

tosdr.case: The service allows you to opt out of providing personal information to third parties

9964.quoteText: We do not share personal data collected online with unaffiliated third parties for their own direct marketing purposes and will not do so unless you agree to such disclosure.
9964.title: This service only shares user information with third parties when given specific consent

tosdr.case: This service only shares user information with third parties when given specific consent
tosdr.tldr: Found under heading 16. Your California Privacy Rights
